alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 3:48PM EST until December 23 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Heavy mixed precipitation expected towards Millinocket and Houlton. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Towards Millinocket and Houlton, sleet accumulations of around three quarters of an inch and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch expected. * WHERE...Northwest Aroostook, Northeast Aroostook, Northern Penobscot and Southeast Aroostook Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM Wednesday to midnight EST Wednesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
